prompt: You stand in your front lawn, watering your garden, when you see a hoard of zombies at the end of the street.
You are walking in the park when you look behind you and see a hoard of zombies approaching.
You step out of your house on a beautiful Sunday morning to see a hoard of zombies chasing you.
You step out of the bunker to face the hoard of zombies.
You are patroling the camp when you see a hoard of zombies approaching quickly.
You walk the empty streets looking for survivors, when you come across a group of zombies eating a survivor.
You aproach a town that was destroyed by the dragon
You dismount your horse in a town on the path to defeat the dragon
You bow before the king who sends you on a quest to slay the dragon
